channel.title: Need help with compiler
channel.description: The compiler I'm currently using (474 Server and Client). [code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar ./src/net/cellkyborg/server/*.java "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar ./src/net/cellkyborg/RSInstances/*.java pause[/code] I get the 'system could not find the path specified' error. Can someone help me fix this?

item.title: Need help with compiler
item.dc:creator: @WrittenBlade WrittenBlade
item.description:
@WrittenBlade wrote:

The compiler I’m currently using (474 Server and Client).

@echo off "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar ./src/net/cellkyborg/server/*.java "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar ./src/net/cellkyborg/RSInstances/*.java pause
I get the ‘system could not find the path specified’ error. Can someone help me fix this?

Read full topic
